scripts.deploy:original: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'Build and deploy' && git push origin main
scripts.deploy:github: npm run build:deploy && npm run copy:deploy && git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy to GitHub Pages' && git push deploy main
scripts.copy:deploy: cp dist/index.html . && cp -r dist/assets . && cp dist/rexuiplugin.js . && echo '<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M12 2L2 7l10 5 10-5-10-5zM2 17l10 5 10-5M2 12l10 5 10-5"/></svg>' > vite.svg
